item.title: Two National Guard members in critical condition after shooting near White House
item.description: President Trump says the gunman behind the "act of terror" was an Afghan who entered the US in 2021.

item.title: Stone-hurling anger unnerves Zambia's 'fix-it' president
item.description: After 2021's landslide win, Hakainde Hichilema has nine months to convince voters he deserves a second term.

item.title: Georgia's pro-EU protesters defiant year after accession process was halted
